text: Gen tte yaru ga i. `Keiten'notami yo, anata gataga watashi-tachi o hinan suru no wa, tada watashi-tachi ga arra o shinji, mata watashi-tachi ni kudasa reta mono (kuruan), mata izen ni kudasa reta mono (rippo, fukuin) o shinjiru tamedearu no ka, tada anata gata no oku ga arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu tamede wanai ka
